original: @180b # // rgya gar skad du padma narte shva ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: rgya gar skad du padma narte shva ra sa dha nam

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du

original: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs //
analyzed: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs

original: sngar brjod pa'i rim pas sna tshogs padmar zla ba la yi ge hr'i: dmar po yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: sngar rjod ba rim ba sna tshogs padmar zla ba la yi ge hr: dmar po yongs su gyur ba las

original: bdag nyid padma gar gyi dbang phyug tu bsgom par byas te /
analyzed: bdag nyid padma gar gyi dbang phyug tu bsgom ba byed te

original: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa ;
analyzed: sems dpa skyil krung gis bzhugs ba

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dmar po rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa snang ba mtha' yas dbu rgyan du byas shing /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ba sku mdog dmar po rgyan rnams thams cad kyis rgyan ba snang ba mtha yas dbu rgyan du byed shing

original: g-yon ngos na gos dkar mos legs par 'khyud cing 'khyud pa'i stangs kyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon ngos na gos dkar mos legs ba khyud cing khyud ba stangs kyis gnas ba

original: phyag g-yon pas padma dmar po bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yon ba padma dmar po snom ba

original: phyag gzhan g-yas pa ni gar byed pa'i stangs kyis khabs kyi phyag rgyar kha 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: phyag gzhan g-yas ba ni gar byed ba stangs kyis khabs kyi phyag rgyar kha byed ba

original: de nas ni aom de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no zhes sngags brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nas ni aom de bzhin gshegs ba rnams thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin no zhes sngags rjod ba byed ba

original: de'i rjes la phyogs brgyad du lha mo brgyad rnam par bsam par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de rjes la phyogs brgyad du lha mo brgyad rnam ba bsam ba byed ba

original: de la padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i shar gyi 'dab ma la rnam par gzigs ma padma dkar po dang dmar po 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de la padma dmar po dab ma brgyad ba char gyi dab ma la rnam ba gzigs ma padma dkar po dang dmar po dzin ba

original: lho'i 'dab ma la sgrol ma ljang gu shing sngon po dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: lho dab ma la sgrol ma ljang gu shing sngon po dang padma dzin ba

original: nub kyi 'dab ma la rnga ma 'khor lo ser @181a * //
analyzed: nub kyi dab ma la rnga ma khor lo ser

original: po dang / autpala sngon po 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: po dang autpala sngon po dzin ba

original: byang gi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can /
analyzed: byang gi dab ma la khro gnyer can

original: padma skya bo dang ser po 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: padma skya bo dang ser po dzin ba

original: shar gyi grva'i 'dab ma la padma'i dri ldan ma padma ser po dang dmar ser 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: char gyi grva dab ma la padma dri ldan ma padma ser po dang dmar ser dzin ba

original: lho'i grva'i 'dab ma la rdo rje padma'i dbang phyug ma nam mkha'i mdog dang dkar ba'i padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: lho grva dab ma la rdo rje padma dbang phyug ma nam mkha mdog dang dkar ba padma dzin ba

original: nub kyi grva'i 'dab ma la sna tshogs padma dkar ba dang dmar po 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: nub kyi grva dab ma la sna tshogs padma dkar ba dang dmar po dzin ba

original: byang gi grva'i 'dab ma la sna tshogs rdo rje ma kha dog sna tshogs pa sna tshogs padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: byang gi grva dab ma la sna tshogs rdo rje ma kha dog sna tshogs ba sna tshogs padma dzin ba

original: de dag thams cad kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma skyil krung bcas shing zhi ba'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma skyil krung cha shing zhi ba

original: lte ba la ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
analyzed: lte ba la ni joms ldan da nyid do

original: de nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas gsang sngags bzlas ba byed ste

original: aom hr'i: padma narte shva ra h'um /
analyzed: aom hr: padma narte shva ra hum

analyzed: padma gar gyi dbang phyug ces byed ba jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs so
